name: Ninja?
description: Ninja? features a variety of movement abilities to help you traverse a procedurally generated level for endless runner fun.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 or later Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar Memory: 100 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar Storage: 90 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
